data.Name: Miles T. Bird
data.About:
T-Bird Capital is the investment vehicle of Miles Bird.

Miles Bird has been investing in and advising early-stage startups in the bay area for 7 years at venture firms like Tuesday Capital [FKA Crunchfund], Correlation Ventures, and Kairos. He's led seed or series A investments in over 25 companies including Imperfect Produce, EarnUp, and Gabi. Most recently he was fortunate enough to join one of his portfolio companies, Meter [www.meter.com] full-time as their first go-to-market hire. Meter is a wireless networking technology company backed by Reid Hoffman, Sam Altman, and the Collison brothers.
